description: This file contains test cases for the React 'App' component, using @testing-library/react and Jest to mock backend fetch responses and verify UI rendering.

methods.name: beforeAll
methods.description: Sets up a mock fetch implementation before all tests to simulate backend responses.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Restores the global fetch to its original state after all tests.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that verifies the welcome message is rendered from the backend.
